routes.text: Subscribe to a resource

purchase_ids.text: array of charge ids belonging to this subscription

routes.text: Show all active subscriptions of user for the input resource

resource_name.text: Currently there are 8 supported values - sale; refund; dispute; dispute_won; cancellation; subscription_updated; subscription_ended; and subscription_restarted.

routes.text: Retrieves all of the successful sales by the authenticated user

after.text: Only return sales after this date. date in form YYYY-MM-DD

before.text: Only return sales before this date. date in form YYYY-MM-DD

order_id.text: Filter sales by this Order ID

page_key.text: A key representing a page of results. It is given in the response as next_page_key.

routes.text: Refunds a sale

amount_cents.text: Amount in cents (in currency of the sale) to be refunded. If set issue partial refund by this amount. If not set; issue full refund. You can issue multiple partial refunds per sale until it is fully refunded.

meta.description: Refunds a sale
